## Selected research highlights
- **Fixed Exchange Rates, Macroprudential Policies, and Monetary Policy Transmissions**  
  Heterogeneous-agent framework quantifying transmission under fixed regimes with capital controls; policy mix and welfare.  
  [Abstract & materials →](research.qmd)

- **Openness and Growth: China vs. Mexico (revisited)**  
  Empirical re-assessment of openness, structural transformation, and growth paths.  
  [Abstract & materials →](research.qmd)

*Full list and drafts on the* [Research](research.qmd) *page.*
